winterwell.jtwitter
Class Twitter.Status

java.lang.Object
  winterwell.jtwitter.Twitter.Status
Enclosing class:
Twitter
public static final class Twitter.Status
extends java.lang.Object

A Twitter status post. .toString() returns the status text.

Notes: This is a finalised data object. It has no methods but exposes it's fields. If you want to change your status, use Twitter.updateStatus(String) and Twitter.destroyStatus(Status).
